sources.title: The House On Trubnaya (1928)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. This Russian comedy follows a country housekeeper who ends up in over her head when she is elected deputy of city administration. The film is beloved to film buffs in Russia, and modern American viewers find it quite charming as well. I've included an English subtitle track as well, although that will only show in media players.Â
